item.description:
Stella and I would like to invite folks west and north of the city to meetup Sunday April 17 in Arlington Center for some Chinese conversation and some good (Americanized) Chinese food.

(this place is just a 10 minute bus ride from Harvard Sq on #77 bus, parking is easy on street or in the restaurant's parking lot)

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Sunday Brunch in Arlington 4/17
